snippet: The mayor of New Orleans, a FEMA official and New York City experts discuss the problem of flooding.
abstract: New Orleans Mayor Mitch Landrieu responds to June 1 Andy Horowitz Op-Ed column weighing flood risk in city.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of New Orleans, a FEMA official and New York City experts discuss the problem of flooding.

headline.print_headline: How Safe Is Your City From a Flood?
headline.main: How Safe Is Your City From a Flood?
